1.label: basic on/off
1.description: triggered at change of the input I1 state and reflecting its state

2.label: basic on/of
2.description: triggered at change of the input I2 state and reflecting its state

3.label: multileve
3.description: triggered at changes of value of the Flush shutter position

4.label: multilevel
4.description: triggered at changes of value of slats tilting position

paramInformation.label: ALL ON / ALL OFF
paramInformation.description: Responds to commands ALL ON / ALL OFF from Main Controller

options.label: ALL ON is not active ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF active
ALL ON is inactive ALL OFF is inactive
ALL ON active, ALL OFF active

paramInformation.label: Reporting in Watts on power change for Q1 or Q2
paramInformation.description: Power consumption change threshold for sending updates

paramInformation.label: Reporting in Watts by time interval for Q1 or Q2
Slats tilting full turn time
paramInformation.description: Slat full turn time in tenths of a second.

options.label: previously set position only in case of UI control
position in case of UI control, push
position in case of UI control, push button

paramInformation.label: Motor moving up/down time
paramInformation.description: Shutter motor moving time of complete opening or complete closing

paramInformation.label: Forced Shutter calibration
paramInformation.description: 0 to 1 a Shutter enters the calibration mode

paramInformation.label: Power consumption max delay time
paramInformation.description: max time before motor power consumption is read

paramInformation.label: Relay delay time
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines the time delay between output relay switching
